projects.title: Demand and Forecasting Analysis under stochastic events Royal Jordanian Airlines case study
projects.description: By March 2020, the COVID-19 lead to the lowest demand for RJ ever, with 0 sales in April due to travel limitations. Restoring accurate forecast is difficult, with time series characteristics varying before and after April 2020. These non-conformities in demand urged the need of resiliency in value chain upstream till downstream, including demand planning.On 15th of December 1963, King Hussein established Royal Jordanian Airlines to be the national air carrier for Jordan. In 2015 RJ crossed +3M passengers carried on +36K flights for more than 52 direct destinations and contributed 3% to the country’s GDP. Fortunately, RJ granted access to preview their data of passenger trips, and cooperated to share their demand forecasting process for enhance opportunity of applying the KPIs on actual data. Focusing on forecasting models and approaches, in an attempt to minimize MAPE as much as possible by choosing the best mathematical model of forecasting. Lack of resiliency can be for the inappropriate forecasting model or error measuring KPIs application. Identification by statistical models lead to understand the behavior of trends and seasonal patterns. The analysis furtherly focused into causes of noise, trend, and seasonality using identification models. Assortment analysis, including the ABC and XYZ, for RJ's five key markets revealed that a more complete and cautious treatment to demand forecasting. RJ process is visualized by SIPOC, EPC and BPMN charts, root causes were revealed by fishbone diagram, prioritized by PFMEA matrix. This influenced the research to focus on forecasting models, as the MAPE accuracy indicator reached 8%.The improvement phase was introduced by the application of 14 mathematical models, while accuracy indicators was the monitoring tool. Winter method was the accurate model of forecasting for the offered RJ time series, giving resiliency, simplicity, and accuracy, according to the accuracy indicators weighted ordering matrix.

projects.title: Automation of periodic Reports
projects.description: The aim of project was to automate the periodic fininical performance reports measured by defined KPIs, through MS office tools especially Excel VBA, we managed to generate a daily, monthly and quarterly reports based on raw data extracted from the system.

contributors.headline: Supply Chain Consultant at Supply Chain Company | Msc of Logistics Engineering

projects.title: LPG station
projects.description:
Working as safety engineer in the project of installing a new LPG station for forklifts at PepsiCo.

Throughout the several stages of project which started from demolishing the old unit, civil works, excavation, installing the new unit then install safety devices and controls, PepsiCo and OSHA safety standards were applied in parallel.

More than 20 workers from different nationalities were working in the project while it was done successfully by zero LTIR.

 The final stage included safety inspection for handling and comissioning the unit.

contributors.headline: Supply Chain Consultant at Supply Chain Company | Msc of Logistics Engineering

projects.title: PET 3 & NRGB production Lines Installation
projects.description:
Working as safety engineer in the project of installing a new PET production line at PepsiCo.

Throughout the several stages of project which started from demolishing the old line, civil works, building a steel structure then unloading the new PET machines using cranes, PepsiCo and OSHA safety standards were applied in parallel.

More than 100 workers from different nationalities were working in the project while it was done successfully by zero LTIR.

 The finishing stages included mechanical works as well as providing power, water, steam and pressurized air then commissioning the line.

contributors.headline: Supply Chain Consultant at Supply Chain Company | Msc of Logistics Engineering

projects.title: Diesel Extraction from Plastic based Wastes
projects.description:
Graduation Project Focused in Extracting Diesel Fuel from Plastic Wastes, using a system which were designed, fabricated then lunched for trails by mechanical engineering students.

 The results were promising as 3.2 kg of PP and PPE plastics wastes resulted a 1 liter of good quality diesel fuel.

 The project had gone through several improvement stages to reach the highest efficiency. 

Moreover, the project report describes the whole processes with mechanism design in details.

contributors.headline: Supply Chain Consultant at Supply Chain Company | Msc of Logistics Engineering

projects.title: Improving RGB Production Line Efficiency Using DT5 Best Practice Tool
projects.description:
The RGB production line in PepsiCo were suffering from low efficiency values.
 Therefore, productivity and performance department had to engage with an action plan to improve the process. 

As a mechanical engineering trainee, the project was required to graduate from the training program, so I handled this project through DT5 best practice tool and suggested many action items which will improve the line efficiency by 5% at minimum. 

These points were summary of 3 months in defining, measuring, finding solutions, applying it then sustaining the results.

profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Manage delivery of materials for the assigned Suppliers, monitoring the production plan and coordinating logistics until receiving into the systems, in line with company processes and procedures 
• Cooperating with Suppliers, Manufacturing Operations, Project Managers, Quality and Engineering to define preventing actions, recovery plans and keeping all main metrics into the system updated 
• Giving the visibility to Internal customer on Supplier plan, preventing and managing priorities and criticalities to ensure Manufacturing and Sales Plan 
• Collaborating with Suppliers and supporting relevant Service Provider to ensure On Time Delivery for all documentations associated with the materials supplied 
• Interacting with the Platform and Operating Units Procurement Organization and to provide regular feedback about supplier performances to refine the supplier strategy 
• Supporting the execution of risk mitigation plan related to supplier criticalities and Manufacturing/Project Management urgencies, coordinating with Material Management to support Inventory management 
• Partnering with Quality to support supplier surveillance and on time issues resolution, cooperating with Logistic team to generate transportation best plan to minimize cost and improve efficiency 
• Supporting both Vendor Recovery negotiations & results and Account Payable resolution 
• Supporting key procurement initiatives through continuous improvement projects. 
• Ensuring supplier compliance with regulatory and reputation requirements

lean project.
